class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: This course covers the contemporary principles of valuation, acquisition, financing, and financial management of real property. Emphasis is on the analytical techniques of mortgage lending, valuation, tax factors, investor objectives, and trends in the industry.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 2719, Section #: 3249, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: J. Shanken, Status: Open
